findings.rationale: The perpetual nature of the confidentiality obligations may create long-term liability without clear end dates, which can be burdensome for the parties involved.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The clause requires indemnification without limit, which could expose a party to significant financial risk in case of any breach.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of liability limitation exposes parties to unlimited financial liability, which can be particularly risky in case of significant damages.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The clause grants exclusive ownership of work product to one party, which may be seen as unfair and could deter collaboration.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.
